action.action-desc: Ms. Spanberger (for herself, Ms. Bonamici, Mr. Fitzpatrick, and Mr. Katko) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Labor

form.official-title: To extend certain national school lunch program requirement waivers addressing COVID–19, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Keeping School Meals Flexible Act.

section.header: Extension of certain national school lunch program requirement waivers addressing COVID–19
section.text: Section 2202 of the Families First Coronavirus Response Act (42 U.S.C. 1760 note) is amended—

paragraph.text: by amending subsection (e) to read as follows:

subsection.text: The authority of the Secretary to establish, grant, or extend a waiver under this section shall expire on June 30, 2023.

paragraph.text: by adding at the end the following:

subsection.text: There is authorized to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary to carry out this section.
